entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
